column4: hi all, do you have to install the tight_vnc server on your ubuntu machine before you attempt to connect to it from tight_vnc client running on a windows box ?
no ubuntu's built in one will do just fine
open terminal type vino-preferences allow remote access and you should be able to connect
i tried that and i still fail to remote into my ubuntu box from a windows box. Is there a log file on ubuntu i can check why it is refusing connection ?
